https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bN58EvVisNw6V9HZiNoUrXLn36B.jpg Dark Tales of Japan is a collection of five short horror films that are directed by five notable Japanese film directors, which are told by a mysterious old lady in kimono on a late-night bus traveling on a long isolated mountain road. Dark Tales of Japan
